ticket.title: ASICS changes: Events etc.
ticket.original-body:
Running Events 1. /running/events > World is broken and/or too slow 2. Remove "Event Updates" from both the /running page and /running/events pages (/running/events map should stretch the length of the page)
Bazaar Voice 1. BV test comments showing up http://reviews.asics.co.uk/bvstaging/8011- en_gb/2446/gel-kayano-17-reviews/reviews.htm. I’m guessing this is not a problem? 2. BV comments not displaying on running page
￼ User Settings > Account Deletion 1. Change text to: ( ) Close my account. ( ) I wish to close my account and delete all my comments.
ticket.latest-body:
Running Events 1. /running/events > World is broken and/or too slow 2. Remove "Event Updates" from both the /running page and /running/events pages (/running/events map should stretch the length of the page)
Bazaar Voice 1. BV test comments showing up http://reviews.asics.co.uk/bvstaging/8011- en_gb/2446/gel-kayano-17-reviews/reviews.htm. I’m guessing this is not a problem? 2. BV comments not displaying on running page
￼ User Settings > Account Deletion 1. Change text to: ( ) Close my account. ( ) I wish to close my account and delete all my comments.
ticket.original-body-html:
Running Events
1. /running/events > World is broken and/or too slow
2. Remove "Event Updates" from both the /running page and /running/events pages (/running/events map should stretch the length of the page)

Bazaar Voice
1. BV test comments showing up http://reviews.asics.co.uk/bvstaging/8011- en_gb/2446/gel-kayano-17-reviews/reviews.htm. I’m guessing this is not a problem?
2. BV comments not displaying on running page

￼
User Settings > Account Deletion
1. Change text to:
( ) Close my account. ( ) I wish to close my account and delete all my comments.
